QuestData.Title: Get Zherin!
QuestData.Description: If we're going to get those oil drilling rights, we need to know what the Horde is offering. How can we win if we can't do them one better?!$B$BTheir negotiator, Trackmaster Zherin, is up there talking with one of their khans right now. Why don't you head up and persuade him to hand over the Horde's proposal?$B$BYou don't have to kill him... we're not savages! Just rough him up a bit.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Get the Horde's Proposal from him!
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the Horde's proposal? What are they offering for the drilling rights?
QuestData.RewardText: What?! How'd they get that much gold to offer?$B$BWe don't have that kind of money!
